active.effects: Grants a decaying shield to nearby allied champions and yourself for up to 2.5 seconds, absorbing up to 130- 300 (based on highest level between target and caster) (+ 20% of caster's bonus health) damage ( 650 radius) (120 second cooldown). Shielded targets are Eclipsed for 20 seconds.

other.limit: Eclipsed: Additional  Locket of the Iron Solari shields [ are only 25% as effective ][ absorb only 32.5- 75 (based on highest level between target and caster) (+ 5% of caster's bonus health) damage ].
